column3: upset about a student saying something to him. He began to hit and yell with his clipboard. Verbally aggressive. Tried to elope/hit people. Escorted to timeout.

was upset when he didn't understand SS work. He started to throw chairs but calmed himself. He became frustrated during Math and became physical with staff and peer. He eloped physical intervention used.

column4: verbally aggressive and non compliant. He was separated from other students in the hall
column5: he continued to be vulgar and swear at staff. He then escalated to physical aggression towards staff. He was escorted to time out

screaming and ran to fishbowl. Wouldn't calm. Support talked to him
